name: Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 2 - Senseless Act of Justice
name_original: Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 2 - Senseless Act of Justice
description:
Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 2 - Senseless Act of Justice is an adventure game developed by Straandlooper Animation. It came out on 25-08-2011. It was published by Telltale Games.
You can play Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 2 - Senseless Act of Justice on PC.
